pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Empirical Dynamic Modeling // Inferring causal associations in cross-sectional earth system data with extensions to convergent cross mapping from Sugihara et al. (2012) doi:10.1126/science.1227079 and partial cross mapping as described in Ma et al. (2020) doi:10.1038/s41467-020-16238-0.
